text: int main ( ) { int t , n , a [ 100 ] [ 100 ] , i , j , k , sum , sum1 , sum2 , llarge , large ; scanf ( "%d" , & t ) ; for ( k = 0 ; k < t ; k ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; for ( i = 1 ; i <= n ; i ++ ) { for ( j = 1 ; j <= i ; j ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , & a [ i ] [ j ] ) ; } } llarge = 0 ; for ( j = 1 ; j <= n ; j ++ ) { sum = 0 ; for ( i = j ; i <= n - 1 ; i ++ ) { sum = sum + a [ i ] [ j ] ; } sum1 = sum + a [ i ] [ j ] ; sum2 = sum + a [ i ] [ j + 1 ] ; if ( sum1 > sum2 ) large = sum1 ; else large = sum2 ; if ( large > llarge ) llarge = large ; else continue ; } printf ( "%d\n" , llarge ) ; } }
